title: RADIO ETHER PROGRAM ONE & TWO
description:
These are demos for a radio program I pitched to Lee Abrams when he was still at XM. I really hope you enjoy them. Any and all feedback is very much appreciated!  <a class="__cf_email__" href="/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection" data-cfemail="05666d6477696076756a6071777c45776a646177706b6b60772b666a68">[email&#160;protected]</a><script cf-hash='f9e31' type="text/javascript">

RADIO ETHER
PROGRAM 2

1. Intro

2. Albert Ayler Quartet: Ayler (tenor saxophone, vocal) with Don Ayler (trumpet); Richard Davis (bass); Milford Graves (drums). 
Recorded at the funeral of John Coltrane, July 21, 1967 at St. Peter&#039;s Lutheran Church: New York City 
Love Cry/Truth Is Marching In/Our Prayer (Don Ayler) - ALBERT AYLER HOLY GHOST (Revenant 213) 

3. Rocket Music On - Mike Rep And The Quotas - Black Hole Rock [The Harrisburg Sessions 2004] (Old Age/No Age 005) 

4. talk

5. Barbara Allen - Texas Gladden - Ballad Legacy (Rounder CD 1800)

6. Cripple Creek - Hobart Smith - Instrumental Music of the Southern Appalachians {1956} (Tradition Records)

7. talk

8. Elder JJ Hadley - Prayer Of Death: Part 1 (Charley Patton Voice & Guitar June 1929 Paramount 12799 (GE15225) -
Charley Patton Complete Recordings 19-29 - 1934 (JSP)

9. Elder JJ Hadley - Prayer Of Death: Part 2 (Charley Patton Voice & Guitar June 1929 Paramount 12799 (GE15225-A) - 
Charley Patton Complete Recordings 1929 - 1934 (JSP)

10. My Black Mama: Part 1 - Son House Voice & Slide Guitar June 1930 Paramount 13042 (L408-2}
Charley Patton Complete Recordings 1929 - 1934 (JSP)

11. My Black Mama: Part 2 - Son House Voice & Slide Guitar June 1930 Paramount 13042 (L409-2)
Charley Patton Complete Recordings 1929 - 1934 (JSP)

12. talk

13. Crucifixion - Phil Ochs May 26, 1973 East Lansing, Michigan (SBD)

14. Reading from "The Time of the Assassins" a study of Rimbaud by Henry Miller

15. Broken Hearted Blues - Etta Baker - One Dime Blues (Rounder Select) 
Feb 14, 1992

16. talk

17. Song To Woody - Bob Dylan July 5, 1990 Berlin, Germany

18. Outro

DJ: Charles Cicirella
Recorded Saturday, October 27, 2007 
Cleveland, Ohio


RADIO ETHER
PROGRAM 3
